title: Kanye West’s Deal to Buy Parler Unravels
description: The parent company of Parler, a social media service popular with right-wing audiences, said it had “mutually agreed with Ye” to end the deal.

title: Facebook Failed to Stop Ads Threatening Election Workers
description: The ads, submitted by researchers, were rejected by YouTube and TikTok.

title: Sam Bankman-Fried Blames ‘Huge Management Failures’ for FTX Collapse
description: Mr. Bankman-Fried spoke at The New York Times’s DealBook conference, in his first public appearance since his crypto exchange imploded.

title: How the Collapse of Sam Bankman-Fried’s Crypto Empire Has Disrupted A.I.
description: Mr. Bankman-Fried and his colleagues spent more than $530 million to battle what they saw as the dangers of artificial intelligence. Now those efforts are reeling.

title: Elon Musk Hopes to Test a Brain Implant in Humans Next Year
description: The tech multibillionaire said his company, Neuralink, was seeking government approval to test his device in people, and predicted it could happen in six months. Others have been conducting similar tests for years, but no device has been marketed commercially.

title: Elon Musk Averts Feud With Apple by Meeting Tim Cook
description: Mr. Musk, who had said the company was trying to sabotage Twitter, met with Apple’s chief executive, Tim Cook, on Wednesday.
